website_summaries.verdict: Includes all the extra features of other smokers in this price range with an added digital display.
pros: Features a viewing window so you can see your food without opening the door
External wood chip tray allows for easy loading
Digital controls are easy to use
cons: The digital controls aren't always accurate and can get damaged easily

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for 79 dollars.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this smoker. The Amazon sizing is wrong. This smoker is the same size as the master built 30" smokers. It appears to be well made and assembled easily. I only did a 3 hour seasoning run as described in the instructions. It heated quickly and did a good job of controlling temperature. It is well insulated and is quite spacious. I will update this review after some usages. update: Smoked a 5 lb pork shoulder yesterday and it came out perfect. It controlled the temp very well and the pulled pork was fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: carl a baldino

customer_reviews.title: Great little smoker for a great price
customer_reviews.text: The amount of room inside is great, simple design and insulated unlike other similar priced units. It came really well packed. I was able to quickly put it together and did the 3hr seasoning the directions called for. We’ve smoked some ribs and a brook trout my son caught both turned out awesome. Only reason I gave it four stars is because when you need to reload the wood chips you have to open the main door and all the smoke goes out. But overall for a cheap priced smoker you simply can’t beat it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problems with wiring
customer_reviews.text: On the third time we used the smoker, after 3 hours at 225°, the control box on the top began smoking itself and smelled of burnt plastic and it never worked again.
customer_reviews.author: Crabboil

customer_reviews.title: Help, broken controller - :(
customer_reviews.text: We loved the smoker when it worked but unfortunately I have had this smoker less than a month and it's already stopped working. The control box power light comes on, the blue numbers blink and then the whole power box just shuts off. We unplugged it and plugged it back in but it just does the same thing. Do you have a replacement for the control box? Does this happen often? Is there a fuse? This smoker is brand new and has left us hanging with prepared meat but no smoker. :(
customer_reviews.author: rammo

customer_reviews.title: E/Z to use.... perfect results.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the first time today. It was fantastic. other than adding chips a few times during an all afternoon slow smoke it was basically a set and forget procedure. Did ribs and chicken quarters. Set at 225 deg. for 30 min on one side, flipped and went another 30 min. Added some chips, wrapped everything in foil and went another 2 hrs. Everything was perfectly smoked and falling off the bone. This was the best results I've ever had, and for the least amount of work involved. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Simple, works as advertised, and a great design for a compact electric smoker. You may have trouble getting longer pieces of meat in this, but other than that this thing worked excellent for a 15 hour brisket smoke a few days ago. A+
customer_reviews.author: CatalystCS

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed! I bought this as a gift for my husband and it worked a total of twice before breaking. The control panel/display is VERY cheap and now it won't turn on at all so we are having to return it only four days later. Avoid this lemon!
customer_reviews.author: Vegeta Rocker

customer_reviews.title: Not sure who to blaim here...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! 6/6/19 just opened the box (which looked new) and to my surprise the smoker looked used and smelled terrible. Once I got the smoker out of its box and opened it, my assumption was correct. Not only was it dirty but it reaked of spoiled smoked meat. I looked at my order review and didn't see any details about the smoker being used either.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Quality, Stylish Smoker
customer_reviews.text: This smoker is a must have. It was easy to assemble and extremely easy to use. You don't have to worry about running out of propane, it is extremely easy to add wood chips. The digital control makes it easy to get the correct temperature setting and the heat distribution is spot on. Very stylish and very well thought out. Having the window makes it easy to check on the food without opening the door to let heat out. Love the ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my husband and he loves it! I love that it doesn't get so hot on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Askew

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price, BUT
customer_reviews.text: I just received this smoker. Easy to put together. Does have a ding in the back from transit but doesn’t effect the functionality and it is not enough to bother me. What does bother me is this is the only smoker I have seen that has no handles on the sides to easily move the smoker from storage to use area. It is not convenient at all with no handles to lift. Other than that it seems like a bargain. Only just seasoned the unit so in a day or two I will actually smoke something other than the inside of the smoker.
customer_reviews.author: bubba61

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazed at how much room and the simplicity of it. Great for a first timer.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product, spend a little bit more and get a better one
customer_reviews.text: Very displeased with this product. I used it one time for 8 hours yesterday then brought it inside when it was fully cooled as the Instructions say to do. I go to plug it in today to fire up and it doesn’t even turn on. I opened the digital control panel that turns the smoker on and it started leaking water; I’m assuming this is due to condensation from when the smoker was running and now without the control panel it won’t turn on at all. I purchased the 3 year warranty with the product and amazon has a new one on the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for Christmas and it worked only once. The heater element went bad the second time i used it. Would not recommend to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: cherrissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a 5 star, even though the smoker arrived damaged (no box damage so I believe the damage was done prepacking). This is my first smoker and I was a bit hesitant. My brother has smoked meat for over 40 years and have loved everything he has done in the smoker. I have used it for smoking a duck, ribs and pork roast. ALL came out really well. Easy to put together and easy to clean water tray, drip pan and racks. The digital read out is spot on. I am going to try out the digital REMOTE temp gauge so I don't keep opening the door when it is getting close to being done.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Nice smoker, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The smoker was easy to put together and worked very good for the 1st few times. The 3rd time I used it, the digital controls wouldn't come on. It was less than a month old and I couldn't use it. I called customer service and they told me a few things to try and said if these steps didn't work, that they would send a new digital controller. It had a loose wire inside and works great again. Good working smoker, good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get your meat sweat on!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t think... just buy this. ERHMAHGERD it’s amazing! I’ve smoked an incredible amount of meat and cheese in this thing. Summer sausage, hams (YES! “Junk” precooked spiral sliced cheap ham can be your neighbors wet dream!), turkeys, brisket, pork shoulders, chickens, wings, etc. Learning the smoke tray/fast smoke took a few tries, but the practice was delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Jay L. Warfel

customer_reviews.title: We love our smoker!
customer_reviews.text: We love this! Took us a little bit to understand how to program it...could have just been us though! LOL! It REALLY smokes. Unless you want whatever you smoke to taste like a forest fire....go easy on the amount of wood chips you put in the bin. Make sure you give it the right amount of time for the smoker to begin smoking and get up to temperature BEFORE you put your food in it. Once we got the hang of it, we have been very pleased with it. Short learning curve on the smoker, a little longer on how to get your food at the exact amount of smoke and make sure it is done.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Ragland

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took some time but it was well worth it. Great for the weekend smoker! The front glass makes it perfect for customiizing .
customer_reviews.author: Sp0rt4320

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 4 days then stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 4 days then stopped working. I called smoky hollow, needs a new control panel and power source both on back order. Pros easy to use. Digital controller makes setting the temp very easy. The physical construction is solid and well insulated, maintains and holds temp. The wood tray holds 2 cups of chips and generates smoke above 250F, below this temp will not generate smoke. Smoked a brisket, beef jerky. Both were delicious. Cons stopped working. Next smoker will be propane.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Can you say yummy?
customer_reviews.text: I love this smoker! Great smoke and cooks great. Works alot better and easier than my charcoal pit. Can't wait to use it again! Update. Still Loving it! I have used my smoker 5 times now and it is wonderful!Ade a smoked chicken last night and it was much better than those rotisserie chickens that you buy at the store. So juicy
customer_reviews.author: janice

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: I am still amazed that I got this for under 100 bucks. Easy to follow assembly. I was worried it wouldn't reach the right temp in winter. Wrong. It's 8 degrees today and it's at 300 degrees. This thing is air tight and well insulated. (Max temp it said was 275). I did modify slightly by adding lava rock around the heating element which helps to disperse heat more evenly to the chips. Doing a brisket, chicken, pork butt and pork loin first smoke, can't wait to see how it turns out.
customer_reviews.author: Husker

customer_reviews.title: Okay but lower end
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace another mastebuilt I was not aware that this was a lower end model, you only get 3 racks instead of 4. and no side wood-chip port, you need to open the smoker to add the wood chips. The display also seems to be of a lower quality as it's very difficult to see in the sunshine you need to cup your hand over it and stick your eye close so you can read the temp/time numbers. It has worked well for my needs, brisket, ribs and pulled pork come out just as good as they have in the past. It's just missing some of the convenient things of the higher tier masterbuilt.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cabinet smoker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great smoker for the sale price of $79. I just took off 4 racks of ribs. It heats up pretty fast, and I really like the timer and temp control. I was smoking 3 chickens and forgot they were in the cabinet (they stayed in about 2 extra hours), but I had set the timer and it shut down automatically, chickens were still great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I ran this smoker for 6 hours to season it. It did not even char the chips that were placed in the tray. After six hours there was a slight hint of a smoke smell in the smoker. The only way I will be able to smoke in this thing will be to burn one of those pellet smoke tubes like I use in my green egg once in a while. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: bruff53

customer_reviews.title: stopped working
customer_reviews.text: put it together and set it up to season it and it quit working within the first hour. going to call manufacturer to get new controller.lets see how that goes. the other thing that bothers me is that almost all problems in trouble shooting section of the manual refer to faulty controller.seems to me they need to do an upgrade.I want to try this first before i return it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not get hot enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these about a year ago. I've given it several chances, but last night I was smoking two small pork butts (5 lbs ea) and they would not come up to temp. I had the smoker temp set to 270F and left them on all night (~8 hrs) and the internal meat temp was only 172F this morning. I've probed the chamber before and it's usually about 20-30 dg lower than what the smoker temp control shows, which should've still got these past the stall. I don't recommend this one and will be looking for something different.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton N.

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker flawed design
customer_reviews.text: Loved the smoker and every time we used it the meat would come out so juicy and tender. Was working great up until about a week ago. There is a design flaw in the smoker to where when you are smoking the meat the juice falls down onto the heating element and cord below which caused the element to melt in two and the cord to burn up also. The smoker is no longer able to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Josh836

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Junk, bought this in Feb of 2018 used it a few (2 or 3) times over the summer, stored it over the winter and now it doesn't work. Not saying the temperature controller was the greatest or easy to use but now all it does is flash and constantly beeps. Should have spent a few buck more and bought another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Like it but it broke
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ease of this smoker and meat comes out very flavorful. I bought this to replace a Masterbuilt with Bluetooth that was much more expensive. The problem is the computer system malfunctioned after about 13 months (which is 1 month too late for the warranty). I’ve read that I can call the company and get a new control unit but I haven’t had the time or the money to call and replace it. Again, I’ve read it is about $50-$70. Which is about 30% of the cost of the unit itself. I’ll update if I get around to calling the company and getting a new control unit.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Need time to learn to manage the internal temperature of the meat.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and design of the smoker. I still need to learn how o manage the temperature better. I was unable to get the internal temperature of the meat to the desired temperature. Also, once the thermostat reached the set temperature it seemed to stop providing heat to the wood chips and they would stop burning/smoking. I think this smoker just requires for the user to cook a few items until you learn how to manage the temperature and the smoke.
customer_reviews.author: N. Dorow

customer_reviews.title: It would be a great smoker if.....
customer_reviews.text: I had the previous model that loaded the chips from the outside but it was getting long in the tooth so I bought this model. I really loved the convenience of the timer and the temp control and this still has that. It would be a really great smoke if it only smoked. I have used it twice and so far it barely turns the chips black and produces very little smoke. Why did they have to change a good thing? Something tells me that lawyers took control of this new design.
customer_reviews.author: J. smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Smoker
customer_reviews.text: This is my first electric smoker. I have tried smoking with wood/charcoal before but it was too much work and too difficult to control the temperature. This smoker is great and is so easy to use. The temperature and time are easy to set. The temperature maintains throughout the smoking period, plus or minus a few degrees. I would have given this 5 stars but changing the wood chips is a little tricky and I did get burned a few times. The smoker is easy to clean and operate. I have made several recipes in the few weeks that I've had the smoker and each one has turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: KMD

customer_reviews.title: They don't honor their warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. The temperature control is totally inaccurate. I've contacted Smoke Hollow 4 times to get a temp. controller which they say will correct the problem. They have repeatedly not delivered on what they said. It takes them st least 10 minutes to answer a call. The record is 45 min. on hold before anyone answers my "important call." They just don't do what they say they will. Will not buy any of their products again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 month review
customer_reviews.text: Great entry smoker! Would have been 5 stars but there is a small design/hack. Moisture builds up in the smoker and can short the electric control unit on top of the smoker. I have kept the unit off to the side so the moisture can vent and not accumulate in the control unit. Besides that; turkey, chicken, ribs, prime rib, Boston butts and briskets have all been excellent. Maintains temp very well.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Dawson

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thing for a particular reason in April, fired it up ONCE then and put the cover on it until I needed it. Well today I turned it on and the control box is SHOT! I mean, seriously! This should be ILLEGAL to sell absolute CRAP like this. I'd gripe to Amazon but they won't do anything about it. So 160 thrown out the window of the car...I will NEVER buy another Masterbuilt ANYTHING again as long as I live...
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Crapped out
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2 months then stopped working. Called the factory and they thought it might be the digital display. It was on back order and would not arrive for 4 months. I sent the item back
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived and the electronics were completely dead. After executing the troubleshooting in the manual, I called the manufacturer and after 45 minutes waiting for someone to answer the phone, she stated that something is certainly wrong with the electronics and we'll start by exchanging the main computer board, but if that doesn't work then call back and they'll send the next component. I'm just sending it back and will try something else. Looks like a good, solid unit, other than the electronics not working, which is a fairly significant issue for an electric device.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wilkening

customer_reviews.title: Fairly well built
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Very little assembly. Not for a pro, I suppose, however; perfect for the novice user, great price. Wish the chip tray was a bit bigger, but I smoke jalapenos for 4 hours and only added wood chips once. The temp stayed very close to the setting I used, on a 75 deg day. Do not yet know how it will perform in the winter yet. I am hopeful. I built a stand for it. I am older so bending is a problem some days.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: can't read the controller outside.
customer_reviews.text: When you take the smoker outside you can't read the display. At All. It's dim colored led and outside in daylight, you can't even see if the lights are on, let alone the display. I have to pull a coat over me and the smoker to read the controls, and of course you can't do that when the smoker is running or else your little tent gets full of smoke and you pass out. Other than that it seems to work ok so far.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Packard

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work - on the highest temperature setting (275 degrees F) the actual internal temperature is only maintained at 200. I'm trying to smoke outside in California in the summer, not like its cold outside or anything. Smoky Hollow customer support will not respond to support requests. This is worth $0
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great 1st smoker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this smoker because it seemed like a good deal. I’m not right very odften but in this instance I was. This smoker is fantastic. It’s just so easy to use. My buddies and I went to Costco and smoked 18 pounds of pork butt which was no match for this smoker. It was perfect. It doesn’t come with a meat thermometer or wood chips but it’s so simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Blew Up and...
customer_reviews.text: ...after 29 days trying to get a response to my case, they won't honor the warranty even though it had only been used a dozen times. They said they would replace it if I wanted to pay $230, which is $80 more than it cost originally. How insulting. This is the ideal case study on how not to provide a positive customer experience. The good news is that no one was hurt when it combusted, but that might not be the case the next time. Go #Char-broil.
customer_reviews.author: LC Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Sad smoker user.
customer_reviews.text: I used it 3 times and got an error first time and had to have the control box replaced. The company was easy to deal with and sent the replacement. Used it the second time. Worked great! Meat was very good, but used it the third time tonight and received an error message again and meat wasn’t done. Had to finish it in the oven just like the first time. Very frustrating!!
customer_reviews.author: Special Education Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Don't use often
customer_reviews.text: I've had it 3 weeks and have smoked meat for 3 weekends and the heating element blew
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hollon

customer_reviews.title: Thermostat issues
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first day used after being “seasoned” according to directions. Have used about 7 more times and is inconsistent to say the least. Temperatures are hit or miss. Some days it goes right up to temp and sustains and other days won’t get any where near temperature programmed. Also, there is no catch pan in bottom of unit to protect heating element. Grease and oils collect in bottom of unit and burn or catch fire.
customer_reviews.author: matthew oakley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use....great results on our first try!
customer_reviews.text: Just used the smoker for the first time. Worked great! Smoked an 8 lb butt and it turned out wonderful! Easy to set up and use...the only downside is that according to the n digital controller, the temp swings a fair amount throughout the cooking process. We can't be sure how accurate that is until we get a separate thermometer though. It still did an excellent job of cooking.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: box in perfect condition, but huge dent in the right side.
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked to see the huge dent yet the box was in perfect condition. The dent makes it hard to remove the racks. The smoker still works great. I wish I could get a partial refund since I received a damaged product. Spoke to Amazon and get a partial refund. Great customer service. Very Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good smoker, and good sized. I had a Smoke Hollow electric smoker for several years and it worked great. Eventually the cord started to fall apart. So, I gave this one a shot, and it worked great for the jerky I made the other day. I recommend using the sawdust like chips as they give off good smoke at low temps.
customer_reviews.author: ANKJr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and simple electric smoker at a low price!
customer_reviews.text: It's an amazing little simple electric smoker for the price. It works well and produces good smoke. I've done plenty of brisket, chicken, dinosaur beef ribs, and chuck roast in just a couple of months and everything has come out great. I did over smoke chicken when I first used the smoker. I kept refilling the chip tray and the chicken tasted of too much smoke. A little goes a long way. Now I only fill the tray once for chicken. Lesson learned. I highly recommend this for a beginner or someone wants a fairly 'hands-off' electric smoker.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble with instructions. I am very pleased with my new smoker. Make sure to read the instructions, it has to be tempered before you can smoke food in it. I found some recipes on Pinterest and my food was delicious. My aunt bought one a week later.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money...
customer_reviews.text: It worked well, honestly, and was easy to assemble and use. Unfortunately after one use, paint in the inside began to peel and bubble. Not sure if the paint is releasing chemicals into my food but I’m a little afraid to keep using it. Thinking this may be indicative that this is poorly made and won’t last long, but I’m pretty disappointed. I no longer have the box and packaging it came in so I don’t think I can send it back and get something else. So if you do purchase this, wait a few uses to dispose of the packaging in case yours has the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not designed well.
customer_reviews.text: So far I have smoked hocks, ham, bacon, brats. It says wet or dry chips but doesn't create much smoke unless wet. The water tray is located in a bad place because all the drippings from the meat go directly into it making for a big mess. Should have designed the drip tray above the water tray to catch all that instead of putting the drip tray in the very bottom. It does hold temp and smokes well.
customer_reviews.author: monghtyscoty

customer_reviews.title: Smoked a 20# stuffed turkey perfectly! ❤️ this smoker!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Smoke Hollow smoker right before Christmas. Read up on different smoking advise from pro smokers. Upped the heat to 275 on a 20# turkey. Smoked it 7 hours. Used hickery chips. Turned out perfect!! Love this smoker! Easy to use, insulated so maintained heat well. Easy clean up!
customer_reviews.author: S. Eilers

customer_reviews.title: Have to open to add wood chips, inconvenient but not so bad.
customer_reviews.text: Was kinda sceptical at first, not the one I wanted, but the one my wife got me for Christmas. I've got to say, I've been pleasantly surprised with its performance. So far I've done chicken, pork shoulder and boudin sausage. Plan on doing a brisket soon.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowchaser_3

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price. Smoked a rack of ribs and a 10 pound beef brisket Had to cut the brisket in half because of the size. Both turned out wonderful. Kept the temp right where I set it. Easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: djd

customer_reviews.title: Completely didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this smoker just to have it delivered and not work. Called, and the control panel (which may be the issue) is on back order till May. Seriously, get it together Smoke Hollow.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Kring

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great smoker, especially for the price. I wish it came with a stand or legs to make it taller. I have a bad back and it is sometimes difficult to reach so far down to remove the smoked goodness. That is my issue and not the company's. I would recommend this smoker to anyone as is.
customer_reviews.author: beagle

customer_reviews.title: ... father's day gift for my husband and it is amazing! It helps that he can turn it on ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a father's day gift for my husband and it is amazing! It helps that he can turn it on and come inside and help with other things instead if sitting outside the entire time like with a charcoal smoker. The food is just as delicious as with a charcoal smoker and it is easier to use. I would definitely purchase it again!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Hileman

customer_reviews.title: Died after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Died after less than a year. Less than a freaking year, and that is not with weekly or even monthly usage. DO. NOT. BUY. THIS. PIECE OF CRAP. Yes, I get it, proper smokers are both more expensive and it takes more effort to learn how to control the temperature. But please, look at my experience and example, and ask yourself if the comparative ease and low proce is worth the freaking thing completely burning out on you in, once again, LESS THAN A YEAR. Please, do not give these people your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: First one I received had a dent on the door and didn’t work had to return
customer_reviews.author: jacob garza

customer_reviews.title: Nice, basic electric smoker
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. On the third smoke. Very good for the price. I got it on a lightning deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked as described.
customer_reviews.text: The smoker was as described and has worked well the few times I have used it. My first attempt was a 10 lb pork roast which I smoked for 10 hours at 225. I had to finish it off in a slow cooker to get it tender. Chicken quarters at 2 1/2 hours at 225 did fine. Be aware you have to do a lot of cleaning after using.
customer_reviews.author: Dixieboy

customer_reviews.title: Finger licking good 🤗
customer_reviews.text: Ran through first round ribs, Cornish hens, brisket, four hours couldn't believe it 😋 good unit
customer_reviews.author: Ranando

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker, control panel ehh
customer_reviews.text: I loved this thing, it was best smoked I ever owned and then after 8 uses and one month the control panel crapped out on me making it useless. I have searched online for a replacement and am yet to fined one.
customer_reviews.author: DaddyCJ

customer_reviews.title: easy and gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: It shows itself a shadow of what it could be, but works well and gets the job done. The price...can't be beat. Unlike my previous smoker that had an exterior wood chip refill, this one you have to open the door and fill the tray...don't get burned. But I can't complain, it get's the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Karl S. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough and maintains heat. The controls are a little awkward to operate but overall a great startup smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Reader

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.....lasted 3 MINUTES.......
customer_reviews.text: Got the smoker.....put it together......planned on using it for Labor Day BBQ. Got up early to season the smoker..... I was doing the 3 hour seasoning that was in the directions to burn the oven for the first time. Plugged it in.....the lights went on.....I programed it for the 3 hours at 275 degrees.....hit the on button, and it started. Went into the house for a few minutes...3.....and the oven Quit working. VERY DISAPPOINTED IN THIS SMOKER.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. And in this case you get a little less.
customer_reviews.text: Temperature control is way off and hardly generates any smoke. Temperature was 50 degrees off, then 40 degrees, and then 30 degrees off. All in the same smoking session. I should have held on to my broken smoker which did the same thing but at least it lasted a few years. This one Sucks!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BigD

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker when it works...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this smoker back in October, used it once and then the temperature would only read 300 degrees rendering the product useless. Amazon sent me a replacement unit and after only 3 used the control screen went completely blank. Luckily I was able to get my money back but I would stay as far away from these smokers as possible. Do some research the control units are a very common issue with this smoker. I even had the smoker on a covered porch with a cover made specifically for the smoker on it and it still failed....
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: My First Electric Smoker
customer_reviews.text: Its a great product only gripe I have is the coating around the door is peeling after the first use (seasoning), I probably should invest in a new seal kit. Will continue to use, I smoked a brisket and some beef ribs also came out great. Using again gonna smoke a whole chicken, can't wait for the results.
customer_reviews.author: DavidR

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker makes great food.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smoker I've ever owed. I've had it now for 4 months and love it everytime I use it. My wife loves it because I am handling the cooking. Our favorite is turkey breast and chicken wings. It's a no brainer for wings. I will always own one now. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: nathan baggett

customer_reviews.title: Assembly not easy for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I did not know assembly was required. I had hoped to use it asap. Took all evening to put together. The box was dented, could not apply cord in back. Inside dented, could not put screw in back of cabinet. The item #34 black tray, still don't know where it goes. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: No hardware or instructions
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this smoker for my husband’s birthday. We unpacked it and was ready to assemble it only to find there were no instructions and no hardware (nuts and bolts) to put it together! Tried calling the manufacturer direct and was seriously on hold for over an hour! Finally got through and they are sending the stuff we need and should have it in a week. Guess we will have to go to “plan B” for what to fix for dinner since I’m obviously not going to be smoking it !? So frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a recommendation from a family member. Was lucky enough to get it under $100. Works great! Smoked some baby back ribs for 6 hours with outside temp in the teens. Only wish they would have put this up higher on a stand and on casters to help move it around. Still love it for constant temperature and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing well built smoker
customer_reviews.text: This smoker really blew me away. First off the temperature is very accurate and holds very steady. I used a dedicated digital thermometer on the grate to make sure the temperature was accurate and it preformed great. This smoker is insulated so it retains heat very well even in cold environments. One thing I was worried about was opening the door to add wood chips or monitor the meat, however this smoker regains heat in a very short period of time. I really can't believe how good of quality this smoker is for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Love My Meats!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bad boy! Have already made tons of meals in it. Easy to use and put the few things together once it arrived. Looks great on my deck, covered when not in use. Recommend this product and brand.
customer_reviews.author: Xanthia

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Holds its temp well. Set and forget is the key to this smoker. Wood chips last about 5 hours before needing to replenish them if your doing a bigger piece of meat like a brisket.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the smoker and well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the smoker and well worth the money, do wish the meat probe would come with the smoker. It will cost you another $15.00 to get from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Read Error Code when I was seasoning it, just as I was following the manual. I called the customer support number in the manual and it told me to go online. When I went online I had to fill out a page and email it to them. After a week I never heard back from customer support from either a call or email. At this point I decided to send it back. I will never buy a smoke hollow product again. I highly recommend looking elsewhere for an electric smoker. I was extremely disappointed in their customer support!
customer_reviews.author: Derek J.

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband for his birthday. We had heard horror stories of certain smokers that are really time consuming and difficult to use, so you end up only using it once and then it sits in your garage. That is most definitely not the case with this smoker! It simply plugs into the wall, you set the temperature, and then you change the wood chips and water out a few times throughout the day (depending on the length of time you are cooking your food.) It is really that simple and yet the food comes out super flavorful. I would highly recommend this smoker!
customer_reviews.author: Caila Motto

customer_reviews.title: Control panel fails
customer_reviews.text: The control panel quit working and cannot get a replacement because they are sold out everywhere due to the fact that these panels are failing on almost all of these smokers. Company customer service sucks.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service - help please
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job on the first smoke but afterwards the electrical panel stopped working properly and would shut off randomly. I sat on hold twice for over 20 minutes and also emailed customer service and have yet to speak to anyone. I think the smoker is great I would just like to get a new electric panel so I can smoke again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker at any price.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 other electric smokers that cost much more than this one. So far I've smoked rib roasts, pork ribs and chicken and all turned out great. Since the expensive smokers seem to last from one to two seasons if this one only lasts a year it is as good a smoker at one quarter the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: Okay smoker
customer_reviews.text: Okay smoker besides the pin pad malfunction after 3rd use. Company was good to give me a free replacement part since it was under the 1 year warranty. Had to prove the date bought. Worked good after the replacement ... So far
customer_reviews.author: Zelly

customer_reviews.title: POOR customer service !!!
customer_reviews.text: Door was bent upon opening box. They do not accept phone calls. Everything must be done on line. Cannot get them to send a new door. Nice smoker, just don’t have any dealings with the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: jeff gaskin

customer_reviews.title: It’s good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas. I’m gonna say it was a win for both of us. No problems at all with it. We are smoking a pork shoulder as I write.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kuncis

customer_reviews.title: DENTED/opened Christmas morning 2019
customer_reviews.text: Husband putting together this fine Christmas morning. Opened to start assembling & it's dented on the top by the smoke outlet and a big dent on the back. Hoping that it works, but super disappointed in the shape it arrived in. Will probably send back :( unless the company would like to make it right?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this smoker. Just smoked a whole turkey and was the best Turkey ever. It was juice and full of flavor. The timer and temperature control is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Love it,and can't beat the price. Every thing works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Justen Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker
customer_reviews.text: I have used it a few times now and I am impressed. The only thing I would like to add is some kind of increased airflow. I have made baby back ribs and brisket so far (delicious)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Denney

customer_reviews.title: Here turkey turkey
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a gift. Was easy to assemble. The receiver loved it
customer_reviews.author: VKM

customer_reviews.title: The electronics go out in less than 1 year with no replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: The electronics go out in less than 1 year with no replacement parts The smoker is well built however when the electrical board stops working in less than a year and they do not have a replacement the smoker becomes a metal box. it is not worth the cost for a metal box with a glass door that does not work in less than 1 year with light use. Do not buy this electrical smoker the electronics are defective
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent smoker for price!
customer_reviews.text: Have smoked ribs and a few pork butts and it's worked great! On my butts I've been smoking for about 4 hrs, then putting in an aluminum pan covered in foil to finish for another 2.5 hrs. Pan fits perfect. The wood chip tray when filled supplies about ~50 mins of smoke. Temp doesn't drop terribly low when opening to refill as long as you dont leave the door sitting open.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H.

customer_reviews.title: Love Smoke Hollow Electric Smoker
customer_reviews.text: I have pellet smoker and when I want to fine tune smoking I always use the Electric Smoker seems to have better ability to concentrate smoke flavor and control time/temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Bmac

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my son. Reviews were iffy, but so far he's used it a great deal of the time and loves it. It does make the foods delicious.
customer_reviews.author: John / Cindy Stella

customer_reviews.title: 3 failures later I decided to buy a different brand
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived dead on arrival. Control panel was replaced and it worked once, then died. I Got a third control panel that worked two more times and died again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but I am a very happy with the results. It’s easy to use and produces excellent quality smoked meats!
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for quality and appearance
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the smoker overall, I struggled with the wood chip holder the first time out. What I tried was increasing the temp to get the chips smoldering then reducing the temp for the remainder of the cooking time. I've done pork and turkey and both were great.
customer_reviews.author: Rik

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Certainly not pro quality, but good smoker for the money. Wish it would have come with a fourth rack. I picked up some casters to put on the bottom where the feet screw in. Very easy to move in and out of garage now.
customer_reviews.author: J Patrick Brorby

product_meta.title: Masterbuilt Smoke Hollow SH19079518 Digital Electric Smoker, Black
product_meta.description: Style:30" Electric Smoker, BlackThe Smoke Hollow digital electric smoker is easy to use. Simply plug this smoker in, set the digital controls, & it does the work! The insulated construction keeps the heat inside & the 800w element provides even, consistent smoking. Add your favorite flavor in the removable water bowl & smoke your favorite foods.
feature_bullets: Exterior: 33.5 in. (H) x 18.2 in. (W) x 18.7 in. (L) Interior: 26.2 in. (H) x 14.8 in. (W) x 12.8 in. (L)
Digital panel controls on/off, temperature, and time
Integrated thermostat temperature control for even, consistent smoking
800 watt heating element for even, consistent smoking
Adjustable Air damper for smoke control
Removable drip pan for easy clean-up
Removable water bowl – add moisture and flavor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars681 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
